title: Question:
author: Moeda
content: AsiaAfricaNortdAmericaSoutdAmericaOceaniaEurope1.Indonesian6.Nigeria10.DominicanRepublic14.Brazil18.Fiji20.England2.Iraq7.Senegalese11.Guatemala15.Colombia19.NewZealand21.France3.Uzbekistan8.Gambia12.Honduras16.Ecuador22.Israel4.SoutdKorea9.Tunisian13.UnitedStates17.Uruguay23.Italy5.Japan24.SlovakiaFIFA has appointed Indonesia as the host for the U-20 world cup since 2019. Indonesia is trusted to host the U-20 World Cup for the year 2021. The U-20 World Cup in 2021 has been postponed to 2023 considering that it was still busy with the Covid-19 pandemic .However, on March 29 2023 through the official website, FIFA removed Indonesia as the host for the U20 world cup 2023 . FIFA's reason for removing Indonesia as host was because after the tragedy at Malang's Kanjuruhan Stadium which killed 127 supporters on October 1, 2022. The same thing happened on the playing field when Israel fired tear gas at a match in Palestine. The attack took place during the Balata FC vs Jabar Al-Mukaber match in the final of the Abu Ammar Cup at the Faisal Al Husseini Stadium on March 30. Source: fifa.com, the-afc.comThis reason led to various public perceptions, because FIFA never spoke about the U20 world cup after the incident. However, FIFA decided to remove Indonesia as the host after several figures in Indonesia, including the public, refused to allow Israel to participate in Indonesia's U20 world cup 2023 . The decision was taken after a meeting with the PSSI president, Erick Thohir.Regardless of what I explained above.Which country will replace the host of the FIFA U20 World Cup?Which country will win the FIFA U20 World Cup 2023 ?

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: For now we can't be sure of the host. Among the three (Peru, Argentina and Qatar) now Argentina have submitted its bid to conduct the U-20 World Cup. Mostly Qatar will win the bid, and I predict it based on the country being the host of the last FIFA World Cup. Indonesia have got a good opportunity and it have missed it due to the political conflicts. It is really a big chance being missed and the sufferers will be the young football aspirants of the nation. Now FIFA have frozen funds for Indonesia Football association. It is nice that almost every continent have got similar number of countries participating. I'm not sure of the winning team, mostly it goes to an European country or to a South American country.

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: Moeda on April 06, 2023, 09:47:01 PMRegardless of what I explained above.Which country will replace the host of the FIFA U20 World Cup?Which country will win the FIFA U20 World Cup 2023 ?I believe that Argentina has a great chance of organizing the U-20 World Cup, an opinion that is also very much shared by the president of FIFA.The candidacy of the current world champion is quite relevant, as this country has a great chance of being accepted for fulfilling all the requirements demanded by FIFA.Brazil also presented its candidacy, but I don't believe they will be able to host this championship, as they have already "benefited" recently as hosts by hosting the main FIFA championship.However, Argentina did not qualify for the tournament, could they host the championship without participating?There is also England and the United States, which are the other candidates and have also qualified for the competition.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: As Indonesian, it was a very sad news when FIFA decided to remove Indonesia as a host of the U-20 World Cup. I lived in a place where I can watch some matches live in the stadium if it will happen but it is just like a dream now. Coming up to the question which country will be the host, I think Argentina is currently the most potential one. They are not qualified so they can participate as a host and it will be replacing Indonesia position. Talking about winning chance, it is hard to predict for me as I'm not following U-20 except my own National team but maybe the winner will be one of European teams.

comments.author: Sithara007
comments.body: The tournament is about to start in four days from now, and I am surprised at the inactivity of this thread. And this is despite so much controversy related to the selection of hosts. Argentina was selected as the hosts, after Indonesia was disqualified. The tournament will be held in 4 Argentine cities - La Plata, Santiago del Estero, Mendoza and San Juan. Obviously Argentina will be the favorites to win the trophy this time, as they have the home advantage. But I will be curious to see how some of the emerging teams perform this time, mainly Uzbekistan, Fiji and Honduras.

Obviously Argentina will be the favorites to win the trophy this time, as they have the home advantage. I see that not many people pay attention to this topic because this event is not really that horrendous, but I congratulate the U-20 Uruguay national team who have successfully won the U-20 world cup this time after fighting hard with the Italian U-20 national team (Luciano Rodriguez scored a beautiful goal and at the same time won for Uruguay in the 86th minute)
